snippet: As Colorado, Minnesota and Missouri head to the polls in the Republican nominating contest, Rick Santorum tries to position himself as the most electable conservative alternative to Mitt Romney. Jeff Zeleny reports.
abstract: As Colorado, Minnesota and Missouri head to the polls in the Republican nominating contest, Rick Santorum tries to position himself as the most electable conservative alternative to Mitt Romney. Jeff Zeleny reports.
lead_paragraph: As Colorado, Minnesota and Missouri head to the polls in the Republican nominating contest, Rick Santorum tries to position himself as the most electable conservative alternative to Mitt Romney. Jeff Zeleny reports.
